lead_paragraph: Rafael Nadal, the defending Indian Wells champion, came back to win the final five games and beat Jo-Wilfried Tsonga, 6-7 (4), 7-6 (3) 7-5, in the fourth round of the Pacific Life Open. James Blake won, 6-4, 6-2, over Richard Gasquet, and Mardy Fish beat the two-time Indian Wells champion Lleyton Hewitt, 7-5, 3-6, 7-6 (4), to also advance.
